title: Sleeping Beauty - Christmas Pantomime
description: The magical Christmas pantomime returns to Hull New Theatre! Join Princess Aurora in this spectacular production of Sleeping Beauty, featuring stunning sets, dazzling costumes, and plenty of laughs for all the family.

title: Christmas Carol Concert
description: Celebrate the festive season with traditional Christmas carols performed by local choirs and the Hull City Hall organ. A heartwarming evening of seasonal favorites.

title: The Nutcracker Ballet
description: Experience the magic of Tchaikovsky's beloved ballet. Follow Clara's enchanting journey through the Land of Sweets in this timeless Christmas classic, performed by a professional ballet company.

title: Christmas Comedy Night
description: Laugh your way into the festive season with top comedians from the UK circuit. A hilarious night of stand-up comedy perfect for a Christmas night out.

title: A Christmas Celebration Concert
description: Ring in the festive season with a spectacular Christmas concert featuring seasonal favorites, carols, and classical masterpieces performed by orchestra and choir.

title: New Year's Eve Gala
description: Welcome 2026 in style with our spectacular New Year's Eve Gala. An evening of music, dancing, and celebration with live band, DJ, and midnight champagne toast.

title: Hull New Theatre Venue Tour - 2026
description: Explore the historic Hull New Theatre with a guided tour. Discover the beautiful Edwardian architecture, backstage areas, and rich theatrical history.

title: Hull City Hall Venue Tour - 2026
description: Take a behind-the-scenes tour of the magnificent Hull City Hall. See the stunning concert hall, learn about its history, and explore areas normally closed to the public.

title: Spotlight Lounge - January 2026
description: Intimate live music sessions in the Spotlight Lounge. Enjoy performances from local and touring artists in a relaxed setting.

title: Winter Memories
description: A nostalgic journey through winter past with classic songs, festive music, and heartwarming stories. Perfect for the whole family.

title: A Winter Celebration
description: Celebrate the season with a spectacular concert featuring classical favorites performed by a full orchestra and choir.

title: Lunchtime Organ Showcase - February 2026
description: Experience the magnificent Hull City Hall organ in this lunchtime concert series. Free admission.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: The classic tale of Beauty and the Beast comes to life in this spectacular pantomime production. Starring Paul Chuckle, Jack Land Noble, and Liv Newcomb.

title: Hull Music Service: Festival of Songs
description: Join local school choirs and musicians for a joyful celebration of songs and music.

title: A Fairytale Evening
description: A magical show featuring beloved fairytale characters, music, and fun for all the family.

title: LOL Comedy Club - February 2026
description: An evening of laughter with top stand-up comedians. Featuring headline acts and rising stars from the UK comedy circuit.

title: Motown's Greatest Hits - How Sweet It Is
description: Celebrate the legendary sounds of Motown with this spectacular tribute show featuring all the classic hits from Diana Ross, Marvin Gaye, The Supremes, and more.

title: A Pirate's Adventure
description: Set sail on an adventure with pirates, treasure, and magic. A swashbuckling family show.
